name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Java Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in developing microservices-based architectures using **Java**, **Spring**, **Docker**, and **Kubernetes**. My skill set includes CI/CD practices leveraging **GitHub**, along with building robust applications with **PostgreSQL** for database management. I have a strong foundation in **REST** APIs and messaging systems like **RabbitMQ** to facilitate smooth data exchange. 

I also bring expertise in **Python** development, utilizing frameworks such as **FastAPI** and **Flask**, alongside libraries like **SQLAlchemy** and **Celery** for asynchronous task management. With hands-on experience in **TypeScript** and modern front-end frameworks like **Angular**, I develop comprehensive solutions that address both backend and frontend needs.

Further enhancing my profile is my commitment to observability and logging, ensuring applications meet compliance standards in industries like healthcare and finance. I have effectively employed **Terraform** for infrastructure management and have integrated automation through platforms like **Retool** and **Zapier**. My diverse tech stack and experience in enterprise-grade solutions make me a valuable asset to any development team.
